io.springlets.web.mvc.support

Class SimpleControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.springlets.web.mvc.support.SimpleControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory, MethodLinkFactoryRegistry

    public class SimpleControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory
extends Object
implements ControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory, MethodLinkFactoryRegistry
    Simple implementation of the ControllerMethodLinkBuilderFactory, as well as the MethodLinkFactoryRegistry. It allows to register implementations of MethodLinkFactory instances linked to controllers, allowing to use them to create MethodLinkBuilderFactory instances for those controllers.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]
